scheduled_maintenances.name: Asia and Africa SMS Carrier Maintenance - Airtel

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Airtel network in Asia and Africa are conducting a planned maintenance from 03 March 2025 at 10:30 PST until 03 March 2025 at 16:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Airtel in Asia and Africa handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - EE

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner EE United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 March 2025 at 14:00 PST until 03 March 2025 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for EE United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 03 March 2025 at 21:00 PST until 04 March 2025 at 01:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to small US carriers handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in India, Colombia and the Philippines is conducting a planned maintenance from 04 March 2025 at 05:00 PST until 04 March 2025 at 08:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be Intermittent delays to subset of Twilio India, Colombia and Philippines mobile and landline phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - SoftBank Mobile

incident_updates.body:
The SoftBank Mobile network in Japan is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 04 March 2025 at 06:00 PST until 17 March 2025 at 08:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from SoftBank Mobile Japan handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

04 March 2025 at 06:00 PST until 04 March 2025 at 07:00 PST
11 March 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 11 March 2025 at 08:00 PDT
12 March 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 12 March 2025 at 08:00 PDT
17 March 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 17 March 2025 at 08:00 PDT

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our MMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 02 March 2025 at 23:00 PST until 06 March 2025 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from United States handsets via subset of United States short codes.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

02 March 2025 at 23:00 PST until 03 March 2025 at 03:00 PST
03 March 2025 at 23:00 PST until 04 March 2025 at 03:00 PST
04 March 2025 at 23:00 PST until 05 March 2025 at 03:00 PST
05 March 2025 at 23:00 PST until 06 March 2025 at 03:00 PST
